product_name: Beekman 1802Pure Goat Milk Facial Cleansing Wipes
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackWith a pack of Beekman 1802 makeup-removing Pure Goat Milk Facial Cleansing Wipes in your purse (or suitcase, or glove compartment, or wherever), you can clean up anytime, no matter how far away you are from running water.
details: DetailsBenefitsThese wipes are the perfect first step to any cleansing routine because of how gentle they are on skinGentle for all skin typesWipes are fragrance free and biodegradablePure Wipes are certified microbiome-friendly by MyMicrobiome AGLab testedSafe for sensitive skinAllergy testedNon-irritatingKey IngredientsGoat Milk is the same pH as your skin, acting like a delivery system to boost absorption of actives deep into skinAloe, Papaya, Pineapple, Cucumber and Vitamin E are powerful antioxidants to help renew skinCoQ10 leaves skin feeling cleanses and nourished with a slight tightening effectItem 2569238How To UseLift seal and remove a wipe. Gently wipe over eyelids, face, and neck to cleanse the skin. After use, put it in the trash. (Don't flush! All wipes are heck on plumbing.) Reseal the pack to keep wipes moist.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, stop use and consult a physician.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Decyl Glucoside, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Extract, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Papaya Fruit Extract, Pineapple Extract, Althaea Officinalis Extract, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Cucumber Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Ubiquinone (CoQ10), Citric Acid, Polysorbate 20, EDTA Disodium, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate...and kindness.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Lift seal and remove a wipe. Gently wipe over eyelids, face, and neck to cleanse the skin. After use, put it in the trash. (Don't flush! All wipes are heck on plumbing.) Reseal the pack to keep wipes moist.Precautions: Avoid direct contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, stop use and consult a physician.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: A great product

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like these. They are fragrance free in the sense that fragrance wasn't added. It smells like the ingredients which I don't like. They take makeup off pretty well. My face isn't sensitive at all, but these make my skin feel like its burning. Not intensely, but its not subtle either. I'll probably use the rest of these for my armpits or something. Not buying again

reviews.headline: Allergic reaction
reviews.comments: Used these wipes before I went to bed and felt very clean. Slept through the night and woke ip to fet ready for work-but to my surpise my eyes were welted shut. Took a shower to hopefully help but just made my eyes so irritated and burn kike crazy. 10 hours later, my eyes still burn, painful snd swen. Would not reccomend this product

reviews.headline: The best facial wipes!
reviews.comments: Note to Ulta - please PLEASE stock more of the Beekman Pure products in-store like you used to!  These wipes are the best out there - cleans great, no irritation. Need more of the Pure products (body wash, etc.). Beekman is THE BEST - especially for those of us with skin sensitivity.

reviews.headline: I would get this product again because it was really good fo
reviews.comments: I like how soothing it was.

reviews.headline: Waaaaay better than drugstore wipes
reviews.comments: OMG these are my favorite. Price is competitive with drugstore brands. BUt these are so superior. Stay wet til the last wipe. Takes off makeup well enough that I keep them in my bedside table and when I'm too tired to take off my makeup, I grab one of these. These makep up wipes leave skin soft and moist...toss on a little night cream and nighty-night.

reviews.headline: Lazy person dream!
reviews.comments: I always lament that these wipes are a lazy person's dream. You can cleanse your skin or remove makeup from the comfort of your bedside. And at the price, for 30 full size wipes, this product is a no brainer if you are looking for go-to sensitive skin safe, fragrance & alcohol free, makeup-removing, cleansing facial wipes.

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: It burns my skin all the time even w a light wipe

reviews.headline: I buy these again and again!
reviews.comments: These wipes are the absolute best! I love the way they leave my face feeling clean, refreshed, and soft. They don't strip, but they do clean very well. Excellent product.

reviews.headline: burning
reviews.comments: an ulta employee recommended these to me & they left a burning sensation, face turned my face red. did not like these at all

reviews.headline: Love these
reviews.comments: These are so nice to keep in the car for when youre out, its hot, and you need to feel clean again (Florida humidity problems üòù). They stay moist even in my car and its 100 degrees out.

reviews.headline: A favorite of mine for sure
reviews.comments:
These are very effective cleansing wipes‚Ä¶..they are a favorite of mine. The wipes are nice and gentle .
I have purchased them many times.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: Personally I wouldn't buy these again. I bought them to use as makeup wipes. They just smear the makeup. They smell just like the Honest Baby Wipes.

reviews.headline: Beekman 1802 Wipes
reviews.comments:
I don't consider myself to have sensitive skin but these do give me a chemical rash when using (tingling sensation, red skin). I read some negative reviews to see if I was alone but others have had a similar experience!

I think its because of the "Papaya Fruit Extract, Pineapple Extract" which can be enzymatic exfoliants. I like these wipes and the brand nonetheless, I just wanted to inform others to proceed with caution if you have sensitive/reactive skin.

reviews.headline: Great cleansing wipes
reviews.comments: They are a good size. They make you feel clean with no sticky or soapy residue .

reviews.headline: Fresh Alternative to face cleanser
reviews.comments: Love these. Buy them all the time for home and travel.

reviews.headline: Beekman for Life
reviews.comments: I have been a Beekman 1802 fan and believer for quite a while now.  I will forever love their soaps but the facial wipes come in a very close second.

reviews.headline: Good, but can take some time
reviews.comments: I like these wipes because they are easier on my skin since it can be sensitive to some chemicals and the wipes are big to cover a lot of surface area, BUT they're not as effective at getting makeup off. It especially smears mascara and liquid eyeliner, waterproof or not, and can take a little time to wipe all of it away. still great for people like me who have sensitive and dry skin, but I feel there can be some improvement.

reviews.headline: Not Clean
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, this product does not have only clean ingredients. Phenoxyethanol is a known endocrine diaruptor.

reviews.headline: Breaking out
reviews.comments:
As one reviewer said;these facial wipes are not moist enough
Also; i have dry skin and have tried many different skin care products and have never broken out
With these wipes, i now have red blotches  all over my face!
I would never purchase this item again!

properties.name: Pros

values.label: Don't try my skin out like some would

display_values: Don't try my skin out like some would

faceoff_positive.comments: These wipes literally make you feel like you just bathed with Beekman's bar of goat milk soap. NO JOKE. ITS LIKE MAGIC! I originally bought them for my face but after realizing how they made my face feel like I just had a fresh washed face I tried them on my pits. My tiny B.O I had was 100% gone. To really put them to the test, I had my husband try them on his pits (he works hard labor so his white Ts get stained with his B.O and you can still smell it even after washing his clothes! He tried these on a hot and sticky day and his B.O went from stingy my nose to basically nothing! We both have eczema prone and very sensitive skin (most products make us break out) and he gets eczema really bad in the summer from sweating. Beekman's products are the only ones we use now. Now that we have these, we use them throughout the day to take a mini shower until we can take a real shower and it has changed our lives! I use mine at work (corporate work attire is so easy to sweat in during a hot summer). Now I no longer have to worry about keeping my arms down when I start sweating and the deodorant isn't helping lol.
faceoff_positive.headline: Magical Wipes! Feels like you just took a shower! No mo B.O!

faceoff_negative.comments: My nana gave me this to try since it's for sensitive skin, which I have big time. I used a wipe to take off my makeup and just kinda clean it before I would workout, so I could save washing it and putting my antibiotic on my face later. I did try and wash it with a wipe before my antibiotic and it was a horrible decision. Lesson learned, but after that I used it regularly, and It made my face incredibly sticky and dry as could be. I put moisturiser on after it dried, but it was still sticky and dry. Well, this morning I was putting on makeup (eye shadow) and had excess makeup so I wiped it down with one of these and I had huge red marks under and outside of my eyes. I've had goat milk before and had no problems, so it isn't a new known allergy. I'm keeping them to let my boyfriend try, since we also have the bar of soap. Would not recommend to a friend to order one, just use a few of mine to try in case it does to them what it did to me and they wasted their money. I am incredibly disappointed.
faceoff_negative.headline: Unknown Allergic Reaction + Sticky

rollup.name: Pure Goat Milk Facial Cleansing Wipes
